content.rendered:
• 5/5 Rating

Simplify Your Trading Journey with Professional Profits

Courses, Accelerators, and an Exclusive Community Await You.

Discover the About Us
Start Learning Today
Join our Discord Community

Program Highlights

About Us

Dive deep into a transformative 21-day program designed to supercharge your trading skills.

Learn More

Services Course

Equip yourself with proven strategies and insights. Navigate the markets with confidence.

Learn More

Unlock Exclusive Trading Insights on Our Premium Discord!

Access to our community, insightful webinars, weekly trade ideas, and receive dedicated support — all within a dynamic trading hub

Learn More

Wall Of Love

Hersho Barazi

Jun 7, 2023

My name is Hersh, I am 37 years old Venture Capitalist and have been a full time Options trader for 6 years. I was self taught by university of Google and Youtube. I have been teaching and trading my strategies for years and I used to swear on fundamentals only. Taking Tori’s courses was one of the BIGGEST game changer in my career.

She gave me the ability to understand what the stocks are doing and what they will do in a way so big that it used to feel like I was in the middle of the ocean swimming around without really knowing where to go. Adding her mentorship gave me a raft, a compass, and sometimes the ability to order pizza from the middle of the ocean. I attached a small example of how Tori’s system helped me gain 137% profits on MY TOTAL PORTFOLIO TODAY. (Career record of course, but looking back…I was a bit aggressive entering my positions.) Tori will give you the tools and the knowledge, the only thing that will stand in your way at that point will be easily yourself against one of the hardest industries to penetrate…Imagine that…. Thank you again Tori.

Read More + Close

Ziah

Jun 28, 2023

Hey Tori, my name is Ziah I am a maths teacher in Australia and I’ve been trading for just over six months. I completed your introductory course and really enjoyed your outlook on trading and methodology. It was simple yet effective and I could use it while still working full time. One benefit of the course was also the fact that I could see the progression to becoming more financially free.

Another benefit of the trading course was your emphasis on psychology. I didn’t really understand it at the start. However, once you start trading more consistently you see the importance of remaining psychologically, stable and strong. I appreciate the time you spent in creating it and I look forward to being able to hopefully one-day complete a mentorship program with you as well as being financially free in the future. I love my job as a teacher however I want to be able to my support my family, as much as possible, and this is a vehicle that will help me achieve that, I love your passion for trading. Keep up the good work.

Read More + Close

Betty Harris

Hey Tori, this has been an amazing mastermind/accelerator. My name is Betty and I just turned 40 (also a Leo) but I have been trading for three and half years and have spent over $10K alone in the last year (over $25K total). I just felt stuck. So many of my previous programs taught about so many indicators and was just making trading so difficult but Tori just helped me first to calm down my mind and relax and really taught me that trading can be simple if we just keep it simple.

What I have loved so far is how to lose and that loses are part of the process and its okay to be wrong as Tori puts it “we are all losers”. So, by her drilling this into my mind, I didn’t take the loses so serious and I just relaxed and I realized that when I am wrong on a trade just close out the position and get back in the opposite side. That has been so big so far with my psyche through this trading journey so far. I can just focus on my trades. Besides the psychology aspect, what has helped me was learning how to draw the trend lines with the step lines which I honestly didn’t know how to do before and with this strategy I feel more capable of setting these trades on the 4 hour and to continue letting the trades go as I see patients because I have my alerts set. I am excited to continue to learn and build with this strategy. I can’t tell Tori thank you enough. I also realized as a trader the most important thing is keeping my capital and I see myself continuing to grow in this journey. Her team is amazing and I really enjoyed this process.

Read More + Close

Nikki

Jun 28, 2023

Hey, I’m Nikki and I live in the UK. I have been trading now for 18 months. After jumping around different strategies I came across Tori on Instagram and immediately liked the idea of using trendlines with support and resistance, so I decided to try Tori’s course back in January and haven’t looked back. I really struggled with entries and am now following a straight forward method which has helped me to become so much more consistent and clear when setting up my charts. Keeping it simple really works!

Lesa

Aug 22, 2023

G’Day, I’m Lesa, from beautiful Australia. I have to say, Tori’s Accelerator couldn’t have entered my life at a more perfect time! While I’ve invested in trading courses previously, Tori’s Accelerator eclipses all my prior experiences. Tori is an excellent educator. She responds to all questions and interacts with the entire cohort. This 21-day immersive journey into trading and Tori’s strategy is truly exceptional. Each day builds upon the last, creating a comprehensive foundation.

The curriculum covers everything from the strategy itself to technical analysis, trade execution, and the psychological aspects of trading. The breakout sessions were nothing short of fantastic. Sharing insights with fellow traders and addressing their questions provided a reassuring sense of camaraderie. What truly stood out was the incredible diversity among the students – spanning the globe, all age groups, and an impressive representation of women in the program. The CSS team, especially Valentina deserve special praise. Their unwavering support and guidance were invaluable throughout the journey. I must mention that having a different coach for our final breakout session was enlightening. Both applied Tori’s strategy with a unique perspective, offering fresh insights and another layer of understanding. While I’ve only tested the strategy with paper trading so far, the results have been very promising. I eagerly anticipate taking the plunge into live trading. To say that I feel fortunate to have discovered Tori and completed the Accelerator program is an understatement. If my two teenage daughters ever express interest in trading, this is precisely the path I’ll guide them down. Massive thanks Tori. You have done an incredible job!!

Read More + Close

Why Choose Professional Profits?

A Wealth of Experience

With 9 years in the trading arena, Tori brings a depth of knowledge and insights that few can match.

Transparent Approach

Tori believes in complete transparency, ensuring that traders are always in the loop and understand the rationale behind every trading decision.

Down-to-Earth Teaching

Tori's teaching style is relatable and grounded, ensuring concepts are communicated clearly and effectively.

Embracing Trading Realities

Rather than painting an overly rosy picture, Tori embraces the real challenges and rewards of trading, preparing traders for the actual ups and downs of the market.

Comprehensive Learning

You'll have a customized trading plan and a streamlined system to sustain your growth

Supportive Community

You'll be comfortable and confident when taking trades

Founder & Instructor,

Professional Profits ✨

My interest in stocks sparked back in 2015 when my uncle offered to teach my sister and I how to trade.

We spent a year learning everything we could from my uncle. We would wake up and talk stocks over coffee.

Then we would sit down and have our training sessions for hours each day.

I’ve now been a student of the markets for 9 years!
